p: The overall score of improvement for elementary pupils was 5.80 points (SD = 10.66), and that for junior high school students was 4.59 (SD = 10.00), which did not differ significantly between the two cohorts. However, two subscale scores increased significantly more for elementary school students: secrets of Adolescence ( t = 2.88, p < 0.01) and Views of Marriage and Sex ( t = 2.68, p < 0.01) ( Table 3).
